en: Hear my voice, O God, in my complaint: Preserve my life from fear of the enemy.
hmr: Aw Pathien, ka lungzîngna thua hin ka râwl hi lo ngai la, A mi dotuhai ṭitumnaa inthawk hin ka hringna hi humhim rawh.

en: Hide me from the secret counsel of evil-doers, From the tumult of the workers of iniquity;
hmr: Thil ṭha naw thawtuhai inrâwn rûknaa inthawk chun mi thuphmang la, Thil suksuoltuhai inhâwrkhâwmhaia inthawk chun:

en: Who have whet their tongue like a sword, And have aimed their arrows, even bitter words,
hmr: Chuonghai chun kâwlhnâm angin an lei an tâtngei a, An thal, thu khahai chun an tin hlak;

en: That they may shoot in secret places at the perfect: Suddenly do they shoot at him, and fear not.
hmr: Mi demkailo chu hmun fienriela an kâp theina dingin; Ṭi lovin, kârlovin an kâp thut hlak.

en: They encourage themselves in an evil purpose; They commune of laying snares privily; They say, Who will see them?
hmr: Thil suol thaw ding chun an infui tuoh a, Châng, inrûka kam thua dâm an inbiek hlak a, “Tuin am chuong chu hmûng an ta?” an tih a.

en: They search out iniquities; We have accomplished, say they, a diligent search: And the inward thought and the heart of every one is deep.
hmr: Rîtlona an zawng suok hlak a, “Ṭhahnemngaitakin kan zawng zo tah,” an ti hlak a. An sûngtieng ngaituona le lungril chu inthûktak a ni seng nghâl a.

en: But God will shoot at them; With an arrow suddenly shall they be wounded.
hmr: Nisienlakhawm, Pathien chun anni kâp a ta, Kârloa thala inhliemin um an tih.

en: So they shall be made to stumble, their own tongue being against them: All that see them shall wag the head.
hmr: Chuongchun, anni lei ngei chun anni a do leiin, sukkatin um an ta, Anni hmu taphawthai chun an lu thinkhum an tih.

en: And all men shall fear; And they shall declare the work of God, And shall wisely consider of his doing.
hmr: Chuongchun, mi po poin ṭîng an ta, Pathien sinthaw chu hril an tih; A thilthaw khawm chu vartakin ngaituong an tih.

en: The righteous shall be glad in Jehovah, and shall take refuge in him; And all the upright in heart shall glory.
hmr: Mi felhai chu LALPAAH lâwm an ta, amaa chun ringna innghat an ta, Lungril indiktak put po pohai chun sawng an tih.
